Trade/Device Name(s): FIRST RESPONSE™ Gold™ Digital Pregnancy Test
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): FIRST RESPONSE™ Gold™ Digital Pregnancy Test device (includes chromatographic strip and digital display)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FIRST RESPONSE™ Gold™ Digital Pregnancy Test, a qualitative chromatographic immunoassay for early pregnancy detection in urine with digital result display.
Indications for Use Summary: Over-the-counter qualitative chromatographic immunoassay for detection of hCG in urine, intended for early pregnancy detection as early as six days before missed period.
